publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1950 Peter Peacock: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) (No.2) Order 2001—That the Local Government Committee recommends that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) (No.2) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Angus MacKay*
